summary: Solution-oriented person with an extensive experience at one of the world's biggest travel companies and in-depth knowledge of translation and localisation processes, quality assurance and project management.

education.degree_name: Qualified Specialist, Hotel Industry and Tourism

profile_positions.description:
- Supports efficient stakeholder collaboration (including localization quality advocacy) and helps maintain feedback loops between stakeholders, LS community and the Quality Management Team.
- Advises stakeholders on quality-related topics, supports the creation of briefs and participates in brainstorms.
- Supports efficient collaboration and communication between the Quality Management Team/LS community and content owners.
- Helps coordinate the creation and maintenance of standards and guidelines and manage their centralized storage, sharing and maintenance.
- Supports in collecting and sharing best practices, ideas, processes, insights and workflows that can be applicable across languages/regions.
- Stays in touch with the industry best practices and trends to ensure world-class quality management level at Booking.com.
- Identifies innovation opportunities: technical, process or service, and works with cross-functional teams to implement them. 
- Creates, coordinates and manages quality improvement projects and programs from beginning to end (from brief definition to completion, participating in brainstorms), creating project documentation and timelines in line with PM leading practices. 
- Tracks and reports on project status, keeping contacts and stakeholders informed and escalating any delivery-critical issues to resolution.
- Serves as the first line of contact for internal and external stakeholders for quality escalations.
profile_positions.title: Localisation Quality Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Coordinating quality projects to completion, effectively ensuring the delivery to agreed SLAs
• Keeping contacts informed of project status and escalating any delivery-critical issues 
• Maintaining documentation and files
• Defining quality project briefs
• Seeking root causes of issues to develop and implement practical and timely solutions, either directly or through others
• Ability to inform quality guidelines for new projects or content prototypes
• Performing risk management to minimize negative client experience
profile_positions.title: Localisation Quality Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Creating a commercial, localized website for the Czech market
•	Providing commercial and creative translations and localization solutions for website copy and other materials 
•	Maintaining the quality of the Czech version of Booking.com high by conducting web, app checks
•	Working the Agile way directly with the app developers and copywriters on bugs solving and copy and localization related issues
•	Coordinating the app releases - bridging between IT Development and Translations Teams
•	Assisting with localization projects in cooperation with other language teams and departments, such as language-focused user/partner research, data collection and analysis designed to optimize the quality and effectiveness of the website and the products
•	Managing and coordinating work of external freelancers

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
•	Building bridges between local PS local teams and Language Specialists by organizing local office visits and events and leading common projects
•	Optimizing processes within Booking Suite by participating in a temporary project while providing constant feedback
•	Improving the quality of the mobile apps by optimizing language testing processes and liaising with the different stakeholders in the Agency and IT
•	Onboarding new colleagues and optimizing the new hires training
•	Organizing team and departmental events
profile_positions.title: Localisation Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Account management for a diverse portfolio of accommodations
•	Organizing internal and partner events/workshops/temporary office
•	Responsibility for wide supply of accommodation for customers to meet their demand
•	Providing consultancies to partners regarding sales and revenue strategies
•	Updating market with the new trends in online accommodation
•	Training and supervision of new colleagues
•	Searching for new opportunities based on data analysis and responsibility for their implementation
•	Cooperation with colleagues and other departments on diverse projects
profile_positions.title: Account Manager Hotels Czech Republic

profile_positions.description:
•	Event planning, design and production within time limits
•	Identifying potential clients to offer them advertising services
•	Delivering sales pitches convincing clients to subscribe for an advertising space 
•	Supervising the hiring and daily operations of new colleagues
•	Building and maintaining strong relationships with potential and existing clients
profile_positions.title: Advertising Sales Representative

profile_positions.location: Barcelona Area, Spain, Prague and Budapest
profile_positions.description:
•	Establishing new accounts by planning and organizing daily work schedule to call on existing or potential sales outlets and other trade factors
•	Account management for a diverse portfolio of accommodations in the Czech Republic and Hungary
•	Keeping management informed by submitting results reports
•	Monitoring competition by gathering current marketplace information
•	Maintaining professional and technical knowledge by establishing personal networks
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative
